### Tender Notification: 
#### Summary of Request for Proposal (RFP)

The Department of Public Servies and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of Global Affairs Canada invites proposals from qualified service providers to deliver hospitality and housekeeping services for official events hosted by the Prime Minister and federal ministers for heads of state, heads of government, foreign dignitaries, and high-level guests of honour. 

### Tender Details 

| **Field Name** | **Description** | **Relevant Information** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| **Reference Number** | Unique identifier for the tender | WS3530518469-Doc3907013954 |
| **Amendment Number** |  Current version of the tender document | 3 |
| **Publication Date** | Date the tender was announced | 2023-03-08 |
| **Tender Closing Date and Time** | Deadline for bid submissions | 2023-04-14 14:00 EDT |

### Service Requirements

The successful contractor will be responsible for providing and managing hospitality services related to food and housekeeping at two main locations: the official government hospitality center (Lester B. Pearson Building, 9th floor) and the Canadian official guest house (7 Rideau Gate). These services will also be provided on an "as and when requested" basis at other venues in the National Capital Region.

### Evaluation Criteria

The evaluation will consider the service provider's ability to provide a high standard of service, ability to meet the service levels and requirements outlined in the RFP, and their ability to work in a high-pressure environment.

### Notice and Attachment

Full tender details can be found at the Ariba Discovery posting, reference number WS3530518469-Doc3907013954, or through the CanadaBuys system. There are no attachments to this notice. 

### Point of Contact

For any questions or inquiries regarding this tender, please contact: 
* Lacombe, Jean-Sebastien (SPAC/PSPC) 
Email: jean-sebastien.lacombe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
